meta.label: Node group
meta.description: Predefined configurations for EKS node groups

params.name: machineType
params.label: Machine type
params.description: EC2 instance type for the nodes. See EC2 documentation for available instance types

params.name: useSpotInstances
params.label: Use EC2 spot instances
params.description: See EC2 documentation for information about spot instances: https://aws.amazon.com/ec2/spot/

params.name: diskType
params.label: Disk type
params.description: EBS disk type for the nodes. Leave empty for default (gp2)

params.name: diskSizeGb
params.label: Disk size
params.description: Disk size for the nodes. Leave 0 for default (20 GB)

params.name: publicKeyName
params.label: Keypair name
params.description: Name of a keypair to use on the instances of the node group

params.name: enableGPU
params.label: GPU
params.description: Enable GPU workloads on the cluster

params.name: preBootstrapCommands
params.label: Pre-bootstrap commands
params.description: Executed before bootstrapping instances to the cluster

params.name: tags
params.label: Tags
params.description: Tags to apply on the created EC2 instances
